bill.title: Relating To Human Services.
bill.description: Amends the office of youth services safe spaces for youth pilot program by clarifying access to services, providing a definition of homeless youth, and expanding the age of youth that may be served. Appropriates funds. Effective 6/30/3000. (HD2)

history.action: Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 01-31-23 9:30AM in conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee recommends that the measure pass with amendments, for recommittal for further consideration. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Belatti, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Takenouchi, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Amato.
Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 20) as amended in HD 1, recommending recommittal to HUS for further consideration.
Recommitted to HUS as amended in HD 1 with none voting no and Representative(s) Amato, Nakashima, Woodson excused.
Re-referred to HUS/HLT, FIN, referral sheet 8
Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS/HLT on Tuesday, 02-07-23 8:45AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Amato, Belatti, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Takenouchi, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.

The committee on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Takenouchi, Amato, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Mizuno, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HUS/HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 419) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 2 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Kitagawa excused (1).

subjects.subject_name: Safe Spaces for Youth Pilot Program
